title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Youre willing to demonstrate more of your devotion and adoration for a special person in your life. Perhaps your vulnerability is a scary prospect since theres always a possibility that one of you wont live up to mutual expectations. However, your sincerity is more of a virtue than a fault. Sacrificing time and energy for those you love is never wasted when freely given. Even when a dearest cant receive all that you wish to offer, you can always choose if you continue. Your heart is made stronger by its loving, not necessarily by the object of your affections. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
